resources.string: Here\'s a custom version of the battle card game\n

Test your chance and defy a friend.
Each round, each of you pick a card and compare their value. ACE is the highest card, TWO the lowest one. In a draw case, keep playing !
\nThe round winner adds its opponent\'s card to his own deck.The first one to collect all the cards wins !\n
\nGood Luck !\nby Timothy Vongsana and Quentin Simard
